sentences: In its conclusions ( FCCC/SBSTA/2009/L.17 ), the SBSTA, inter alia : welcomes progress on and work under the NWP and the direct engagement and contributions, including through action pledges, of many organizations in its implementation; requests the Secretariat to continue enhancing the outreach of the NWP; and reaffirms the catalytic role of the NWP and requests the Secretariat continue engaging organizations, including those implementing education, training and awareness-raising activities and adaptation actions.
